attributes.action: consider funding the child protection agency, named the Committee Against Child Abuse, Nepal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British govt has commendably long since maintained it's tradition of pro -family policies - but what about the 250 million children with no parents ?

As advocate for the babies I tried to saved whilst working on Nepal's Safe Motherhood Programme with the Nepalese govt, the petitioner is calling on the PM. to acknowledge the British govt stance on child abuse and sex trafficking (commonly known as sex tourism), commiting it's support to the above child protection agency, which is attempting to change it's extradition procedures from Asia - so that those found guilty of committing acts of pornography, exploitation and paedophilia etc in resource low countries are prosecuted by courts in each of the offenders' respective countries of origin.

The public can add their support of this anti - trafficking legislation by signing below.

This measure will also help protect the innocent, who may be falsely accused - or approached by begging children - what the CACA are trying to achieve is a legal, legitimate and peaceful solution to this and support from European states.
